nodes.text: The Livien Magnus Spaceport was a spaceport on Ord Radama. Most off-worlders visiting the planet landed in this spaceport.

The Livien Magnus Spaceport could accommodate up to 75 ships, and was occupied by the Ord Radama Spaceport Authority. Most non-Human species avoided the spaceport, and Ord Radama as a whole because of Imperial xenophobia, which ran rampant on the planet.
